title: Document Templates
subtitle: Manage DOCX templates for exporting job results

deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this template?

fileValidation.tooLarge: File size must be less than 10MB

placeholderInfo.title: Template Placeholders
placeholderInfo.description: Use these placeholders in your DOCX template. They will be replaced with actual values when exporting.
placeholderInfo.metadataDescription: Available when metadata extraction is configured. You can use any placeholder name and add a description to guide the LLM extraction.
